title: ANDik-kOla
sahitya:
ANDik-kOla pazhani ANDavan aDi tannai vENDuvOm vaNangi vENDuvOm nAm


anupallavi

  tANDavam ADum tillai ANDavaniDam dEvar vENDiDa avar sirai mINDuyya udittOn


caraNam    ANDu tOrum avanai mINDu mINDu panmurai vENDik-koNDirukka vENDAm aruL peravE
INDu irundE nam idayam adanil avan iru padamum padiya iruttiyE tudittu
